title: Inflation and the Class War
itunes:title: Inflation and the Class War
description:
In this episode Chris walks us through the Federal Reserve discovering Neo-Marxism in a desperate attempt to figure out why inflation happens and why it matters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
